newsitem.title: UK: POLL-Merrill holds EXTEL top spot in UK economists.
newsitem.headline: POLL-Merrill holds EXTEL top spot in UK economists.

text.p: The following are selected results of the 1997 Extel survey of UK economists, weighted by size of funds under management by respondents who voted for them.
Merrill and NatWest retained first and second place respectively.
1. Merrill Lynch - Paul Turnbull, Ian Stewart.
2. NatWest Securities - Geoff Dicks, John O'Sullivan
3. Goldman Sachs - Gavyn Davies, David Walton, Martin Brookes
4. ABN-AMRO Hoare Govett - Kevin Darlington, Mark Brown, Richard Iley
5. Dresdner Kleinwort Benson - David Owen, Leo Doyle
